mapper.select: SELECT recordtime from sharesreport GROUP BY recordtime ORDER BY recordtime ASC

SELECT IFNULL(fundOwnedcount,0) as fundOwnedcount from (SELECT recordtime from sharesreport GROUP BY recordtime) as a LEFT JOIN (SELECT fundOwnedcount,recordtime from sharesreport WHERE sharesCode = #{VALUE }) as b ON a.recordtime =b.recordtime ORDER BY a.recordtime ASC
